addons.description: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
addons.name: skin.aeon.nox.silvo
addons.news: [I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.9.6[/COLOR][/I][CR]- xbmc.gui bump[CR]- Remove support for TV Show Next Aired and use plugin.video.themoviedb.helper[CR]- Add reboot to Android to shutdown menu[CR]- Add setting to auto hide video OSD after user chosen length of inactivity using script.skin.info.service[CR]- Remove addons not updated to work on matrix[CR]- Use script.metadata.editor instead of script.libraryeditor[CR]- Use script.xbmcbackup instead of Skin Helper Backup[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.9.5[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Add music playlist contents for List view[CR]- Fix CinemaVision causing focus issue[CR]- Add Artist Slideshow 3.0 support[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR]For a more complete list visit:[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master[/COLOR][/I]
addons.summary: Created by BigNoid, Modded by SiLVO, and Widgets by Mr. V

addons.description: Plugin for skins to provide library data throughout the skin. It can also be used as standalone plugin to browse the playlists in the video library.
addons.name: service.library.data.provider
addons.summary: Browse movies and episodes in a variety of sorted playlists.

addons.description: This script fetches extended information for several media types (artists, albums, movie sets etc.). Needs skin support.
addons.name: script.skin.info.service
addons.news: Python 3 compatibility[CR]Add Album discart for Artists[CR]Add set details support for Home Window
addons.summary: Script used by skins to show extended media info.

addons.description: Add-on for skins to provide simple managing and listing of user shortcuts (requires skin support)
addons.name: script.skinshortcuts
